messages.content: Justin Harrison works with Jonathan Ruiz.
Jonathan Ruiz is a colleague of Ronald Lopez.
Ronald Lopez works with Joe Ford.
Joe Ford is a colleague of Sara Perry.
Sara Perry works with Gregory Collins.
Gregory Collins is a colleague of Austin Ellis.
Austin Ellis works with Robert Woods.
Robert Woods is a colleague of Cheryl Nguyen.
Cheryl Nguyen works with Eugene Gray.
Eugene Gray is a colleague of Janice Jones.

queries.question: Are Justin Harrison and Janice Jones related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
